text: Exmilitary (also known as Ex Military) is the first mixtape by Death Grips. Death Grips is a hip hop music group. The mixtape was released on April 25, 2011. It was put on the band's website. People did not have to pay money to listen to it. The mixtape was later released on vinyl, compact disc and cassette tape. The mixtape had one single. It is named "Guillotine". It was released on iTunes in August 2011. Many of the songs on the mixtape had music videos. == Track listing == == References == Category:2011 albums Category:Mixtape albums
title: Exmilitary
